config.timestamp.column.name: MODIFIED_DATE
config.query: SELECT * FROM (SELECT esd.SHIPMENT_ID, es.WFE_TRANS_ID AS ORDER_NUMBER, esd.STATUS, esd.TRACKING_NUMBER, esd.CARRIER_ID, esd.QTY_SHIPPED, esod.EXT_REF_ID, esd.MODIFIED_DATE FROM EDOM.E_SHIPMENT_DETAILS esd INNER JOIN (SELECT SHIPMENT_ID, SALES_ORDER_ID, WFE_TRANS_ID FROM EDOM.E_SHIPMENTS) es ON esd.SHIPMENT_ID = es.SHIPMENT_ID INNER JOIN (SELECT SALES_ORDER_ID, EXT_REF_ID, LINE FROM EDOM.E_SALES_ORDER_DETAILS) esod ON esod.SALES_ORDER_ID = es.SALES_ORDER_ID AND esod.LINE = esd.SALES_ORDER_LINE_ID WHERE esd.STATUS != 'CANCELLED' AND esd.STATUS != 'FAILED')
